mapper.select: SELECT DATEZONE_DATEZONE, TIMERANK, MEMBER_CODE, STUDYTIME_DATE, SUMTIME FROM( SELECT TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') + (ROWNUM - 1) AS DATEZONE_DATEZONE FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) TZ LEFT JOIN( SELECT * FROM (SELECT MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_JOB, SUMTIME, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY STUDYTIME_DATE ORDER BY SUMTIME DESC) AS "TIMERANK", STUDYTIME_DATE FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_JOB, SUM(STUDYTIME_STUDYTIME) AS "SUMTIME", TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) AS "STUDYTIME_DATE" FROM STUDYTIME JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{end_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND MEMBER_JOB = (SELECT MEMBER_JOB FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}) GROUP BY MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_JOB, TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) )) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}) ST ON(TZ.DATEZONE_DATEZONE = ST.STUDYTIME_DATE) ORDER BY DATEZONE_DATEZONE ASC

SELECT DATEZONE_DATEZONE, TIMERANK, MEMBER_CODE, STUDYTIME_DATE, SUMTIME FROM( SELECT TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') + (ROWNUM - 1) AS DATEZONE_DATEZONE FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) TZ LEFT JOIN( SELECT * FROM (SELECT MEMBER_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, SUMTIME, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY STUDYTIME_DATE ORDER BY SUMTIME DESC) AS "TIMERANK", STUDYTIME_DATE FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, SUM(STUDYTIME_STUDYTIME) AS "SUMTIME", TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) AS "STUDYTIME_DATE" FROM STUDYTIME JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{end_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND LOCATION_CODE = (SELECT LOCATION_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}) GROUP BY MEMBER_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) )) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}) ST ON(TZ.DATEZONE_DATEZONE = ST.STUDYTIME_DATE) ORDER BY DATEZONE_DATEZONE ASC

SELECT TIMERANK / CASE WHEN TOTAL < 1000 THEN 1000 ELSE TOTAL END * 100 AS PERCENT FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_JOB, SUMTIME, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUMTIME DESC) AS "TIMERANK" FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_JOB, SUM(STUDYTIME_STUDYTIME) AS "SUMTIME" FROM STUDYTIME JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{end_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND MEMBER_JOB = (SELECT MEMBER_JOB FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 1) GROUP BY MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_JOB) )), (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MEMBER_CODE) AS TOTAL FROM STUDYTIME JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{end_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND MEMBER_JOB = (SELECT MEMBER_JOB FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code})) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}

SELECT TIMERANK / CASE WHEN TOTAL < 1000 THEN 1000 ELSE TOTAL END * 100 AS PERCENT FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT MEMBER_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, SUMTIME, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUMTIME DESC) AS "TIMERANK" FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, SUM(STUDYTIME_STUDYTIME) AS "SUMTIME" FROM STUDYTIME JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{end_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND LOCATION_CODE = (SELECT LOCATION_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}) GROUP BY MEMBER_CODE, LOCATION_CODE) )), (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MEMBER_CODE) AS TOTAL FROM STUDYTIME JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{start_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TRUNC(STUDYTIME_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{end_Date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND LOCATION_CODE = (SELECT LOCATION_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code})) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}

SELECT MEMBER_CODE, STUDYSTYEL_ENROLLDATE, STUDYSTYLE_ACTIVITY, STUDYSTYLE_DELIBERATE, STUDYSTYLE_SENSIBILITY, STUDYSTYLE_INTUITIVE, STUDYSTYLE_PERSPECTIVE, STUDYSTYLE_LANGUAGE, STUDYSTYLE_SEQUENTIAL, STUDYSTYLE_WHOLE FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_CODE, STUDYSTYEL_ENROLLDATE, STUDYSTYLE_ACTIVITY, STUDYSTYLE_DELIBERATE, STUDYSTYLE_SENSIBILITY, STUDYSTYLE_INTUITIVE, STUDYSTYLE_PERSPECTIVE, STUDYSTYLE_LANGUAGE, STUDYSTYLE_SEQUENTIAL, STUDYSTYLE_WHOLE FROM STUDYSTYLE WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{loginUserCode} ORDER BY STUDYSTYEL_ENROLLDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
